newsitem.title: USA: World market rice prices -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: World market rice prices -- USDA.

text.p: The U.S. Agriculture Department reported the prevailing world market prices of milled rice, loan rate basis, effective from today as follows:
-- Long grain whole kernels, 13.28 cts per lb, versus 13.28 cts a week earlier.
-- Medium grain whole kernels, 11.01 cts, versus 11.01.
-- Short grain whole kernels, 10.99 cts, versus 10.99.
Based on these prices for milled rice, loan deficiency payment rates and gains from repaying price support loans at the world market price level are nil.
USDA said the prices are in effect until June 10 at 1500 ET.
